tool_description: An easy-to-use API for searching cities, states, and countries from around the world.

api_list.name: Cities Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific cities by name. It returns a list of cities that match the specified search query.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The name of the city to search for.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: The ISO code of the country to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: The order in which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field by which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: country_name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the country to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the country to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: state_code
optional_parameters.description: The ISO code of the state to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: state_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the state to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: state_name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the state to filter results.

api_list.name: City Details
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve detailed information about a specific city by ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the city to retrieve details for.

api_list.name: States Details
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve detailed information about a specific state by ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the state to retrieve details for.

api_list.name: States Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific states by name. It returns a list of states that match the specified search query.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The name of the state to search for.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: The order in which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field by which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the country to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: The ISO code of the country to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: country_name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the country to filter results.

api_list.name: States List
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of states with basic information such as name, code, and country.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the country to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: The order in which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field by which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: The ISO code of the country to filter results.

optional_parameters.name: country_name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the country to filter results.

api_list.name: Country Details
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve detailed information about a specific country by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: It can be country name, ISO2 code, or ID.

api_list.name: Countries Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific countries by name. It returns a list of countries that match the specified search query.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The name of the country to search for.

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: The order in which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field by which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: Countries List
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of countries with basic information.

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: The order in which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field by which to sort the results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for locations (cities, states, or countries) by name. It returns a list of locations that match the specified search query.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The name of the location to search for.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.
